attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Two into one won't go - so the Department for Transport should reduce entry slip roads onto motorways to one lane only and prohibit vehicles from lane one of the entered motorway for 1000m before the said motorway junction. This measure would cut out motorway hold-ups and increase safety.

rejection.details: You have put your address into the main sentence field.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
